id.description: id is the extension ID. Mandatory. See https://developer.mozilla.org/Add-ons/Install_Manifests#id

strict_min_version.description: Minimum version of Gecko to support. Defaults to '42a1'. (Requires Gecko 45)

strict_max_version.description: Maxiumum version of Gecko to support. Defaults to '*'. (Requires Gecko 45)

update_url.description: Link to an add-on update manifest. (Requires Gecko 45)

name.description: Name of the extension. This is used to identify the extension in the browser's user interface and on sites  like addons.mozilla.org.

manifest_version.description: This key specifies the version of manifest.json used by this extension. Currently, this must always be 2.

version.description: Version of the extension, formatted as numbers and ASCII characters separated by dots. For the details of the version format, see https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Toolkit_version_format

One to four dot-separated integers identifying the version of this extension. (Currently based on chrome's format - note the pattern does not validate the max integer size of 65535 nor that leading zeros are forbidden.)
